price: വിശ്വസിച്ചിട്ടുള്ളവരാരെന്ന് അല്ലാഹു അറിയുക തന്നെചെയ്യും. കപടന്‍മാരെയും അല്ലാഹു അറിയുക തന്നെചെയ്യും.
arabic: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

version.title: Malayalam translation - Abdul-Hamid Haidar Al-Madany and Kanhi Muhammad
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Malayalam by Abdul-Hamid Haidar Al-Madany and Kanhi Muhammad.

meta.transliteration: walayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna āmanū walayaʿlamanna al-munāfiqīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
And He will surely make evident
